reviewText: The DVD technology is just too old, thus the price is high than it should be.
This is the way to teach: ALL THREE AVENUES: SIGHT, HEARING, AND EXCELLENT EXPLANATION!!!

Scott is an amazing drummer and a fantastic teacher, he needs to make more dvds!!! He does not judge anybodys talent or lack of... nor does he show off how amazing he really is, he just tries to help with whatever it is you want to do!!! He explains in detail everything on this dvd.
Excellent DVD if looking to teach yourself drums in a hurry, a very thorough guide to getting started.
